document_data.caption: A [[dwarf]] cleric of the Forge domain.
document_data.name: Forge Domain Cleric
document_data.mainbody: The '''Forge domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with [[spell]]s and powers related to metal, fire, and crafting. Deities of this domain taught patience and hard work and were patrons of artisans, blacksmiths, and metal workers. They also encouraged the recovery of lost mines and magic items, as well as the search for the materials and recipes for the creation of powerful items.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to freely cast ''[[identify]]'' and ''[[searing smite]]'', and later ''[[heat metal]]'' and [[Magic weapon (spell)|''magic weapon'']]. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[elemental weapon]]'' and ''[[protection from energy]]'' and later ''[[fabricate]]'' and ''[[wall of fire]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[animate objects]]'' and ''[[creation]]''.
document_data.Powers: In addition, Forge domain clerics gained access to the power ''[[artisan's blessing]]''.
